security.title: Security & trust
security.lede: Ledger Live is designed with a device-first approach. Keys never leave your hardware.
security.item1.title: Signed updates
security.item1.body: Each build is published with a signature and verified on the device before installing.
security.item2.title: Transparency
security.item2.body: Public changelog and beta/stable/LTS channels for security teams.
security.item3.title: Anti-phishing
security.item3.body: Domain alerts, malicious URL blocking and visual verification on hardware.
security.item4.title: Guided recovery
security.item4.body: Step-by-step assistant to restore with your recovery phrase without exposing it.
flow.title: Recommended update flow
flow.lede: Minimize risk by following this path.
flow.step1.title: Backup your recovery sheet
flow.step1.body: Make sure your 24-word phrase is stored safely on paper.
flow.step2.title: Download from ledger.com
flow.step2.body: Avoid mirrors and only download from the official source.
flow.step3.title: Verify the signature
flow.step3.body: Check checksum or in-app validation before installing.
flow.step4.title: Update firmware
flow.step4.body: Connect your Ledger and follow on-screen instructions.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.lede: We answer common questions before you install.
faq.q1: Do I need the device connected to open the app?
faq.a1: No. You can check balances in read-only mode. To sign or update firmware, connect your Ledger.
faq.q2: How do I verify the installer is legitimate?
faq.a2: Download from ledger.com, check the published checksum and validate the signature on the device screen.
faq.a3: Yes, but we recommend staying on the latest stable branch to receive security patches.
